items.name: Maple French Toast
items.description: Sweet, fluffy, and served piping hot, our French toast is flown in fresh every day from Maple City, Canada, which is where all maple syrup in the world comes from. And if you believe that, we have some land to sell you‚Ä¶

items.name: Stack-o-Pancakes
items.description: What do you get? Pancakes! How many do you get? One metric stack! That's equivalent to 1000 millistacks, or a tenth of a kilostack. In short, you get a lot of pancakes.

items.name: Power Muesli
items.description: Is normal muesli too boring? Of course it is. That's why we serve power muesli ‚Äì it's like regular muesli, except we put the word "power" in front of it so we can charge more.

items.name: Fresh-baked Croissant
items.description: This is just a regular croissant that we buy in bulk from a frozen foods supermarket, but we needed some sort of adjective to justify our price. So, it was either "fresh-baked" or "authentic Parisian", and our legal team thinks the latter is probably going to land us in hot water.

items.name: Full English
items.description: If you like eating breakfast out of things that could easily be served any time of day, then we have the perfect thing for you. Comes with tomato ketchup or brown sauce depending on how northern you sound.

items.name: Porridge Deluxe
items.description: This is literally just porridge. Bob, where did you get this picture? Our porridge looks nothing like this. No porridge does ‚Äì who the heck has the time to make porridge like this?

items.name: Penne Carbonara
items.description: What's better than a creamy artisinal pasta that has been hand-made by our chefs? All that with bacon, of course!

items.name: Mushroom Tagliatelle
items.description: If you're the kind of fun guy (sorry not sorry) that likes salami-filled Italian food with a twist, this is the perfect dish for you. The twist? We lied about the meat.

items.name: Tower Burger
items.description: It's a truth universally acknowledged that every restaurant is in want of a burger, and trust us: this thing is so tall you can't even get your mouth around it without dislocating your jaw.

items.name: Thai Red Curry
items.description: This dish errs more towards "scorching" than "spicy", so let us know ahead of time if you want it so we can put a few fire engines on standby.

items.name: Paella Alicante
items.description: This is paella made Alicante-style. We don't quite know what that means, but we need to justify the Spanish junket somehow. ¬°Ol√©!

items.name: Superfood Salad
items.description: Many people believe that kale, spinach, and other such things can detox their body, and if that's you we're happy to take your money from you with this salad.

items.name: Pesto Farfalle
items.description: Cheap, filling, and green enough to make you tell yourself that it's healthy, our pesto farfalle is made from 100% recycled bow ties.

items.name: Corn on the cob
items.description: Seriously, Bob? You want us to charge six bucks for some corn on the cob? Listen, I know we're a hip cafe, but anyone rich enough to afford this price probably doesn't want to eat corn on the cob.

items.name: Fillet Steak
items.description: It's a steak. It's not aged, it's not rubbed in kosher salt, it's not "hand-cut" or some other gibberish ‚Äì it's just a slab of cow on a plate. Might come with sweet potato fries if you ask nicely.

items.name: Cheese Toastie
items.description: It's just two slices of bread; not that complicated, really. Oh, and cheese, obviously.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Our chef spent years trying out various authentic Neapolitan recipes for pizza, but in the end we found this really good frozen thing from Waitrose and we can't tell the difference.

items.name: Veggie Pizza
items.description: This is literally our pepperoni pizza except we picked off the bits of salami and ran it under a cold tap for a couple of seconds.

items.name: Strawberry Surprise
items.description: Bob, people keep asking us why this thing has D and V for its restrictions...

items.name: Macarons Galore
items.description: For times when one, two, or even three macarons aren't enough...

items.name: All Out Donuts
items.description: Donuts! More donuts! And yet more donuts!

items.name: Super Sundae
items.description: This is no regular sundae ‚Äì it's a super sundae!

items.name: Virgin Mojito
items.description: The mojito is a classic drink of rum, mint, lime, and soda, but without the rum.

items.name: Strawberry Cooler
items.description: Step 1: Blend some frozen strawberries. Step 3: Profit!

items.name: Powerhouse coffee
items.description: In the same way that brandy is distilled wine, this is distilled coffee.

items.name: Mexican Mocha
items.description: What do you get if you mix spicy Mexican chocolate into coffee?

items.name: Chrysanthemum Tea
items.description: This is tea made from chrysanthemum.

items.name: Straight Up OJ
items.description: What do you get if you pour a whole bottle of orange juice into a glass? This.
